text: Location of Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region. Valentovce is a small village and municipality in the Medzilaborce District in the Prešov Region of far north-eastern Slovakia. ==History== The village was established in 1808. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 340 metres and covers an area of 2.206 km². It has a population of about 40 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Medzilaborce District
title: Valentovce
